mapper.select: SELECT sur.user_id , sm.id, sm.perms, sr.role_key from sys_user_role sur INNER JOIN sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id INNER join sys_role_menu srm on sr.id = srm.role_id inner JOIN sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.id where sr.status = 0 and sm.status = 0 and sur.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT id, user_name, password, nick_name, type, status, phonenumber, sex, avatar, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, email, login_fail_count, account_locked, lock_time, unlock_time, last_login_time FROM sys_user WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND del_flag = 0
